topic: Getting to Know Genre of Viewing Materials!

definitions.title: Documentary
definitions.definition: A factual and research-based film that presents real-life events, people, or issues in depth.
definitions.example: Example: A film exploring the life of sea turtles and their migration journey.
definitions.explanation: Documentaries aim to inform or educate the audience about reality.

definitions.title: Movie Trailer
definitions.definition: A short promotional video that teases the story, characters, and excitement of an upcoming movie.
definitions.example: Example: The trailer for a superhero movie showing highlights and key scenes.
definitions.explanation: Trailers are designed to attract viewers to watch the full film.

definitions.title: Weather Report
definitions.definition: A segment that provides updates about temperature, rainfall, and other weather conditions.
definitions.example: Example: PAGASA announces heavy rains expected in Metro Manila.
definitions.explanation: Weather reports help people prepare for daily or upcoming weather events.

definitions.title: News Flash
definitions.definition: A brief and urgent report that interrupts regular programming to deliver important news.
definitions.example: Example: Breaking news about an earthquake interrupting a live TV show.
definitions.explanation: News flashes deliver time-sensitive updates immediately as they happen.

definitions.title: Internet-Based Program
definitions.definition: An informative or entertaining program that can be streamed or accessed online.
definitions.example: Example: A YouTube video series about science experiments or travel.
definitions.explanation: Internet-based programs allow audiences to learn and be entertained anywhere using the web.
